H0.text: What is the traditional tradename for a person who works high up on church spires and chimneys. Spireman

H1.text: What is the traditional tradename for a person who works high up on church spires and chimneys. Chimneymaster

H2.text: What is the traditional tradename for a person who works high up on church spires and chimneys. Heightsman

H3.text: What is the traditional tradename for a person who works high up on church spires and chimneys. Steeplejack

A4.text: A steeplejack is a craftsman who scales tall buildings and structures to carry out repairs or maintenance.

A5.text: Steeplejacks erect ladders on church spires and steeples, industrial chimneys, cooling towers, bell towers, clock towers, skyscrapers, or any other tall structure.
